body_html:
1. Be sure to install the arm cross compiler toolchain (with apt-get)
  2. Update to master... paths have moved: this worked for me out of the box
git clone git@github.com:tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
 ./tensorflow/contrib/lite/build_rpi_lib.sh
body_text:
Be sure to install the arm cross compiler toolchain (with apt-get)
Update to master... paths have moved: this worked for me out of the box

git clone git@github.com:tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
 ./tensorflow/contrib/lite/build_rpi_lib.sh
body:
1. Be sure to install the arm cross compiler toolchain (with apt-get)
2. Update to master... paths have moved: this worked for me out of the box
```
git clone git@github.com:tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
 ./tensorflow/contrib/lite/build_rpi_lib.sh
```
